premise_source_doc_sentence: Marta Fran Kauffman  (  born September 21 , 1956  )  is an American writer and TV producer , best known as the co-creator of the popular sitcom Friends , alongside David Crane .

Friends  (  stylized as F • R • I • E • N • D • S  )  is an American television sitcom , created by David Crane and Marta Kauffman , which aired on NBC from September 22 , 1994 , to May 6 , 2004 , lasting ten seasons .
